description: This file defines a fragment named HomeFragment used in an Android application. It manages the display of a list of restaurants, allowing users to filter by favorites and toggle favorite status. It interacts with view models, repositories, and UI components to render the restaurant list and handle user interactions.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment responsible for displaying a list of restaurants, with filtering options for favorites, and managing user interactions with the list.

methods.name: onAttach
methods.description: Initializes the RestaurantAdapter with callbacks for click, favorite toggle, based on activity context.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up RecyclerView, SwitchMaterial, observers for view model data, and handles UI updates.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of HomeFragment.
